name: Export to Google Docs
description:
"Can you copy that into Google Docs?" Ugh. Someday everyone will be using Coda, but until then Google Docs remains a sort of "lingua franca" of the productivity world.

Using this Pack you can quickly copy the contents of a page or canvas into a new Google Doc, and update or append to it later. You can use the Pack's actions in buttons or automations to remove the tedium of copying things back and forth.

Note: The Coda to Docs conversion process is good, but not perfect.
Also note: This Pack can only update or append to docs that _it originally created_. Those actions won't work for Docs you created manually, etc.
Also also note: In order to export to a specific folder you need to copy it's ID using this tool: https://packs.erickoleda.com/export/

This Pack is not created by or affiliated with Google.
The Google Docs icon is the property of Google.
shortDescription: Use buttons and automations to export page or canvas content to Google Docs.
